revision.text: '''Wacan''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Iapapa]], at least 1 [[Qualot]], at least 1 [[Pinap]] and at least 1 [[Grepa]]. Various [[Farming Setups]] using Wacan can be found [[Farming Setups#Wacan|here]].
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
